### Nebraska law banned abortion after 20 weeks and limited to licensed providers **but SMA not criminalized**
:::

::: columns
::: {.column width="90%"}
::: {.container .fragment .fade-up fragment-index="1"}
::: {.timeline .timeline-left style="height: 720px;"}
::: timeline-block
::: timeline-icon
![](images/search_warrant.png)
:::

::: timeline-content
Detective sought search warrants to access Facebook DMs

::: {.timeline-details .fragment .fade-out fragment-index="2"}
[:mag: Requested private Facebook activity for teen and mom from April 15-present]{style="padding-top:20px;display:block;"}

[:cop: Court told evidence needed to determine "whether the baby was stillborn or asphyxiated."]{style="padding-top:20px;display:block;"}

[:triangular_flag_on_post: Probable cause based on violation of body disposal law]{style="padding-top:20px;display:block;"}

::: timeline-content
Facebook DMs suggest use of abortion pills to end pregnancy

::: {.timeline-details .fragment .fade-out fragment-index="3"}
![](images/abortion.svg){style="height:160px;float:right;padding-left:10px"} [:pill: Messages obtained revealed discussion between mom and teen about ending the pregnancy with abortion pills beforehand pills]{style="padding-top:20px;display:block;"}

[:credit_card: Mom suggested she purchased the pills and provided teen instructions]{style="padding-top:20px;display:block;"}

[:jeans: Teen said could not wait to get the "thing" out of her body and "finally be able to wear jeans"]{style="padding-top:20px;display:block;"}

[:tea: Days later teen's friend also contacts authorities claiming they saw teen take the pills to cause a miscarriage]{style="padding-top:20px;display:block;"}
